Home » 37P1 Dhammānuloma (1), Tikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (1) » 21 Ajjhattattika » 21.1 Paṭiccavāra » 21.1.2 Paccayapaccanīya » 21.1.2.1 Vibhaṅgavāra
Naārammaṇa
Ajjhattattika
Paṭiccavāra
Paccayapaccanīya
Vibhaṅgavāra
Naārammaṇa
8.
2773Ajjhattaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ajjhatto dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  ajjhatte khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe ajjhatte khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. Khandhe paṭicca vatthu…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ paṭicca…pe… . (1)
2774Bahiddhā dhammaṃ paṭicca bahiddhā dhammo uppajjati naārammaṇapaccayā—  bahiddhā khandhe paṭicca cittasamuṭṭhānaṃ rūpaṃ. Paṭisandhikkhaṇe bahiddhā khandhe paṭicca kaṭattārūpaṃ. Khandhe paṭicca vatthu…pe…  ekaṃ mahābhūtaṃ…pe…  bāhiraṃ…  āhārasamuṭṭhānaṃ…  utusamuṭṭhānaṃ…  asaññasattānaṃ…pe… . (1)
